title: Hundreds Of Chechens Join ISIS, Including Group's No. 2 Leader
teaser: Rebels from Chechnya have joined ranks with other jihadists in ISIS. David Greene talks to Gordan Hahn, author of Russia's Islamic Threat and an analyst for the Geostrategic Forecasting Corporation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
